item.description:
On Friday March 11, Canadians living in Boston are invited to a reception being hosted by Canada's four Atlantic provinces (Nova Scotia, New Brunswick, Prince Edward Island and Newfoundland). This will be an excellent opportunity to meet other Canadians living in the Boston area as well as learn more about opportunites in Atlantic Canada. Canada’s East Coast Reception will include appetizers and a cash bar. You can learn more about the “Canada’s East Coast” attraction event
online at www.canadaseastcoast.ca.
item.why: It's a great opportunitiy to learn more about Atlantic Canada

group.name: The Boston Expat Canadian Meetup Group

item.name: Canada's East Coast Reception & Networking Event
